title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.10 - Stable name-restriction on partnership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.10 - Stable name-restriction on partnership

State Regulations
A partnership which, by ownership or lease, controls the
racing qualities of a horse shall race such horse under the name, real or
stable, of a member of the partnership whose proportionate interest in the
horse meets the requirements of section
520.1. All horses, the racing
qualities of which are controlled by a given partnership shall be raced under
such name. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
